Reason: The configuration option 'hinted_handoff_throttle_in_kb' is performance-sensitive. This is because the configuration directly affects the rate at which hints are dispatched to other nodes in the cluster, which can have a significant impact on system performance. The code related to this configuration involves creating a rate limiter based on the value of 'hinted_handoff_throttle_in_kb', which controls the maximum rate of hints traffic. This rate limiter is crucial for ensuring that the system does not overwhelm a particular node with hints traffic, thus directly impacting system performance. Therefore, any changes to this configuration can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
